follows.title: Follow
follows.text: Leverage the expertise of seasoned traders while keeping control of your capital. Just choose a program and Genesis Vision will automatically copy the trades from your account. You will be able to withdraw your investment or exit trades at any point in time.

programs.title: Programs
programs.text: Invest your money with the peace of mind of knowing that a manager’s track record is stored on the blockchain. Select investment programs that suit your personal profile and let the manager do the work for you. You will be able to withdraw your investment or profits only at the predefined intervals.

funds.title: Funds
funds.text: Diversify your capital across hundreds of cryptocurrencies in one click. Select a fund with a composition that matches your opinion on the market and let the manager readjust while the market evolves. You retain full control of your investment. You can withdraw your capital at any time.

params.title: Trading settings
params.tolerance-percent-tooltip: This parameter shows the percentage of the maximum possible deviation of investors opening price from the price at which the managers transaction was opened. Deviation ranges from 0% to 20%. If the price at the time of opening the transaction changes by more than the specified percentage, then the transaction will not open.

programs-page.description: Select investment programs that suit your personal profile and let the manager do the work for you. You will be able to withdraw your investment or profits only at predefined intervals set by the program’s manager.
programs-page.title: Programs

follows-page.description: Just choose a program and Genesis Vision will automatically copy the trades from your account. You will be able to withdraw your investment or exit trades at any point in time.
follows-page.title: Follow

funds-page.description: Diversify your capital across hundreds of cryptocurrencies in one click. Select a fund with a composition that matches your opinion on the market and let the manager readjust while the market evolves.
funds-page.title: Funds

section.text-1: Genesis level reflects the experience and reliability of a manager.
section.text-2: All of the investment programs of a non-verified manager are limited to the first level and can’t level up unless the manager passes the KYC procedure. Once the verification process is completed, the investment programs of a manager are levelled up to the second level.
section.text-3: Starting from the second level, the level will depend on Av. to invest and is  subject to constant change.
section.text-4: The available amount of money for investing in the manager is calculated as
section.text-5: The Success of the trading manager is calculated with the help of the Genesis Ratio, which is the ratio of the program profit to its risk. The formula is similar to the Sharpe ratio and is set in a range from 0 to 1. If Genesis Ratio <0.2, then the program is high risk and the Investment scale is limited to 1 meaning that the manager can attract no more than his own deposit.
section.text-6: This is a multiplier of the volume traded by the manager relative to the program balance for all periods. It is calculated similarly to the Genesis Ratio, being a weighted average over all periods.
section.text-7: To have a volume multiplier of 1 the managers weekly trading volume needs to be approximately the same as the amount of funds in his/her program. In the case of Forex programs, the volume is divided by the shoulder.
section.text-8: The coefficient is designed so that trading more in one period can compensate for the lack of volume during another period, but one-time high volumes won’t compensate for the lack of trading.
section.text-9: More information can be found in the

list.subtitle: Investment Scale is calculated according to a formula that takes into account:
list.list-item-2: The Success of the trading manager.

notes.title: Notes:
notes.note-1: If the investor funds in the program exceed Av.to invest, then the Success Fee and Stop out Level are decreased until the investor funds in the program become less or equal to Av. to invest. This change takes effect in the new period.
notes.note-2: If the manager is not verified, the available investment limit is always $1000, translated into account currency. Otherwise, the available limit is set in the range from $5k to $300k.

tooltip.assets: Objects that have an identifiable value and are traded on crypto markets.
tooltip.structure: The current allocation of funds selected by the Manager.
tooltip.entry-fee: The commission that the investor pays the manager for investing in the fund. Set by the manager and calculated as a percentage of the amount invested.
tooltip.exit-fee: The commission that the investor pays the manager for withdrawing funds from the fund. Set by the manager and calculated as a percentage of the amount invested.
tooltip.balance: The current amount of funds in the fund.

status.PROGRAM: The current status of the investment program (Active/ Investing/ Withdrawing/ Ended)
status.FUND: The current state of your investment in the fund (Active/ Investing/ Withdrawing/ Ended).

tooltip.investors: The current number of investors in the fund.
tooltip.calmar-ratio: A comparison of the average annual compounded rate of return and the maximum drawdown risk of asset managers and hedge funds.The higher the score, the better the portfolio is formed.
tooltip.profit-change: How much in % has the profit changed in the current time period compared to the previous one in the same period.
tooltip.sharpe-ratio: Program performance indicator, which is calculated as the mathematical ratio of the average return to the average deviation of this return. The higher the Sharpe Ratio value, the lower the portfolio risks.
tooltip.sortino-ratio: A variation of the Sharpe ratio that only factors in the downside risk. The greater the value of Sortino Ratio, the higher the efficiency of the portfolio and the lower the investment risks of investing in a fund.
tooltip.max-drawdown: The biggest drawdown of a fund during the selected date range.
tooltip.target: The fixed percentage of the coin (asset) allocation in the total fund portfolio.
tooltip.current: The current percentage of the coin (asset) allocation in the total fund portfolio.

status.program: The current status of the investment program (Active/ Investing/ Withdrawing/ Ended)
status.fund: The current state of your investment in the fund (Active/ Investing/ Withdrawing/ Ended).

description.disable-reallocation-message: The next reallocation will be available on
description.close-fund-notification: You are about to close the fund. After you confirm this, all your funds will be withdrawn, no one will be able to invest in the fund anymore, but investors will still be able to withdraw their funds with a zero commission.
description.close-fund-notification-success: Request to close the fund was sent successfully.
description.withdraw-notice-text: You can withdraw only the invested funds, the profit will be withdrawn to your account at the end of the period automatically
description.unauth-popup: To invest in the selected fund please login as an investor or create a new investor account.
description.auth-manager-popup: In order to invest in investment funds of other managers please login as an investor or create a new investor account.

tooltip.exit-fee: The commission that the investor pays the manager for withdrawing funds from the fund. Set by the manager and calculated as a percentage of the amount invested.

status.PROGRAM: The current status of the investment program (Active/ Investing/ Withdrawing/ Ended)
status.FUND: The current state of your investment in the fund (Active/ Investing/ Withdrawing/ Ended).

tooltip.profit-change: How much in % has the profit changed in the current time period compared to the previous one in the same period.
tooltip.sharpe-ratio: Program performance indicator, which is calculated as the mathematical ratio of the average return to the average deviation of this return. The higher the Sharpe Ratio value, the lower the portfolio risks.
tooltip.sortino-ratio: A variation of the Sharpe ratio that only factors in the downside risk. The greater the value of Sortino Ratio, the higher the efficiency of the portfolio and the lower the investment risks of investing in a fund.
tooltip.max-drawdown: The biggest drawdown of a fund during the selected date range.
tooltip.target: The fixed percentage of the coin (asset) allocation in the total fund portfolio.
tooltip.current: The current percentage of the coin (asset) allocation in the total fund portfolio.

description.notify-hint: Notify me when the program is available for investment
description.entry-fee-levels: The entry fee is disabled for programs that have not reached level 3. It will be charged only for programs with level 3 or higher.
description.withdraw-notice-text: You can only withdraw the invested funds, the profit will be withdrawn to your account at the end of the period automatically

signal-provider.title: Make a signal provider
signal-provider.disclaimer: Parameters cannot be changed in the future.

description.close-program-notification: Investment program will be closed after this reporting period. Current investment requests will be cancelled, and new requests won’t be accepted. Profit and funds from the trading account will be deposited to investors and manager according to their shares.
description.close-program-notification-success: Request to close the program was sent successfully.
description.auth-manager-popup: You must be logged in to invest in a program

tooltip.trading-volume: The total Trading volume for the selected period, divided by the leverage.

tooltip.investment-scale: The current value of the indicator, which depends on the Age, Volume Scale and Genesis Ratio. The indicator is set in a range from 1 to 20. Av. to invest = Investment scale * Manager Balance
tooltip.volume-scale: This is a multiplier of the volume traded by the manager relative to the program balance for all periods. It is calculated similarly to the Genesis Ratio, being a weighted average over all given periods.
tooltip.genesis-ratio: The ratio of the profit of the program against its risk. It is set in the range from 0 to 1. If Genesis Ratio <0.2, then the program is high risk and the InvScale is limited to 1, meaning that the manager can attract no more than his own deposit.
tooltip.av-to-invest: The amount available for investment up to the next period.
tooltip.entry-fee: The commission that is paid to the manager by an investor for investing in the program. The commission is set by the manager and calculated as a percentage of the amount invested. The commission is charged when investing in programs that have reached the third level.
tooltip.success-fee: The commission charged from the profit. It is set by the manager and calculated as a percentage of the profits earned over a certain period of time. If there is no profit, then there is no success fee charged.
tooltip.success-fee-signal: Commission charged from copy trading profits. The fee is calculated according to the method of the High-water mark. With this method, the percentage is not taken from the profit for the period, but from the difference between the investors' investments and the previous maximum profit.
tooltip.volume-fee: A volume commission, charged only for opening a transaction.
tooltip.stop-out-level: A compulsory closing of positions at current market prices when a loss reaches the Stop out level. The period is automatically closed and all money is distributed to investors minus a loss. If the current reporting period of an investment program was ended due to the Stop out trigger, then in the next period the investors who had investments in the program when Stop Out have triggered, the Entry fee = 0
tooltip.profit: Profit or loss resulting from the manager trading. Calculated according to your share of investment in the program.
tooltip.reinvest: If the reinvestment trigger is on, then at the end of the period all profits after deducting the commission will be reinvested back into the program. If the button is not pressed, then at the end of the period all the profits will be transferred to your GVT wallet.
tooltip.equity: The current amount of funds in the program, taking into account the profit / loss of open transactions
tooltip.investors: The current number of investors in the program.
tooltip.period: The time interval in the program, which is set by the manager when creating the program. At the end of the period, profit/loss is distributed between the investors and the manager, according to the share in the program, and all received queries for investment and withdrawals are processed.
tooltip.trades: The number of trades the manager has performed during the selected date range.
tooltip.success-trades: The percentage of successful trades among the number of total trades during the selected date range.
tooltip.profit-factor: An indicator which is defined as the gross profit divided by the gross loss for the selected date range.
tooltip.sharpe-ratio: A measure of the effectiveness of a program, which is calculated as the mathematical ratio of the average yield to the average deviation of this yield. The higher the ratio, the lower the risk of investments, and higher the hypothetical profit.
tooltip.sortino-ratio: A variation of the Sharpe ratio that only factors in the downside risk. The larger this indicator, the better and more effective the program in terms of combining risk and profitability.
tooltip.max-drawdown: The biggest drawdown of a program during the selected date range.

auto-join.text: In the event a program hits the Stop-Out limit:
auto-join.li-1: “Ignore SO” is turned off → your investment (minus losses) is returned to your wallet.
auto-join.li-2: “Ignore SO” is turned on → your investment (minus losses) is reinvested in the program keeping all configured conditions saved.

settings.label: Using GVT to pay for fees

gvt-fees.title: Fees and Discounts

section.text-1: Any Genesis Vision user who holds a certain amount of GVT receives a discount for transaction fees. The size of a discount can vary and depends on the amount of GVT that is being held. The regular trading fee is 0.3%, and the information on the tiered discount system can be found in the Genesis Markets Trading Conditions section.
section.text-2: Users of the Genesis Vision copy trading feature who hold any GVT on the Genesis Vision balance are eligible for discounts and also have the platform success fee of 10% for both investment programs and copy trading signals reduced by 1% for each 1000 GVT held.
section.text-3: For managers the commission for trading will be debited from the manager’s GVT wallet. At the end of the reporting period, the manager will receive a refund of the commission at the expense of increasing the share of own funds in management.

gvt-fees.note: * Please note that to be eligible for a discount tier you should hold GVT on your Genesis Vision wallet for at least 7 days

2fa-page.title: Two-factor authentication
2fa-page.alt-code: Or enter this secret key into your Google Authenticator device:

disable.title: Disable two-factor authentication
disable.success: You have successfully disabled the two-factor authentication. However, we strongly recommend you keep it enabled. This can protect your funds from being stolen.

codes.copy-success: Recovery codes were successfully copied to the clipboard.
codes.copy-error: Failed to copy data to the clipboard.
codes.title: Please read carefully
codes.successfully: You have just successfully configured the two-factor authentication. We will ask you for the 2FA Code in any potentially dangerous situation, such as logging in or withdrawing funds.
codes.recovery_codes: You can find your recovery codes below. You can use them in case you lost your 2FA key or lost your phone with the 2FA application installed. Each recovery code can be used only once. Save these codes on paper and put it in a safe place. If you are not sure that you can provide a secure place for the recovery codes, it would be safer to ignore these codes.
codes.warning: WARNING: We do not store your recovery codes. If you lost the access to your 2FA, it is most likely that we couldn't help you to return the access to your account.

period-and-closing.title: Period and closing
period-and-closing.text-signaltradingaccount: The signal trading account will be terminated after confirmation. All open positions will be automatically closed.
period-and-closing.text-externalsignaltradingaccount: The signal trading account will be terminated after confirmation. All open positions will be automatically closed.
period-and-closing.text-account: The investment program will be closed after this reporting period. Current investment requests will be cancelled, and new requests won’t be accepted. Profit and funds from the trading account will be distributed between investors and manager according to their shares within the aforementioned program.
period-and-closing.text-follow: The investment program will be closed after this reporting period. Current investment requests will be cancelled, and new requests won’t be accepted. Profit and funds from the trading account will be distributed between investors and manager according to their shares within the aforementioned program.
period-and-closing.text-program: The investment program will be closed after this reporting period. Current investment requests will be cancelled, and new requests won’t be accepted. Profit and funds from the trading account will be distributed between investors and manager according to their shares within the aforementioned program.
period-and-closing.text-signalprogram: The investment program will be closed after this reporting period. Current investment requests will be cancelled, and new requests won’t be accepted. Profit and funds from the trading account will be distributed between investors and manager according to their shares within the aforementioned program.
period-and-closing.text-fund: The fund will be closed after pressing the button
period-and-closing.text-period: The current period of the program will end in one hour.
period-and-closing.close-confirm-notification-externalsigna: Do you really want to close trading account?
period-and-closing.close-confirm-notification-signaltrading: Do you really want to close trading account?
period-and-closing.close-confirm-notification-trading-accou: Do you really want to close trading account?
period-and-closing.close-confirm-notification-fund: Are you sure you want to close this Fund? This action is irreversible.
period-and-closing.close-confirm-notification-signalprogram: Investment program will be closed after this reporting period. Current investment requests will be cancelled, and new requests won’t be accepted. Profit and funds from the trading account will be deposited to investors and manager according to their shares.
period-and-closing.close-confirm-notification-program: Investment program will be closed after this reporting period. Current investment requests will be cancelled, and new requests won’t be accepted. Profit and funds from the trading account will be deposited to investors and manager according to their shares.

trades-update.title: Trades and open positions delay
trades-update.text: Managers have the ability to delay the public display of their trades and open positions to protect their strategy.

two-factor-confirm.title: Two-factor authorization (2fa)
two-factor-confirm.text: You must confirm your 2fa code to access the Huobi native platform.

investment-limit.text: At any time you can enter or cancel certain limitations on av. to invest, or even prohibit new investments if your Investment limit is 0. If the investment limit you've entered is larger than the av. to invest value calculated for your current level, then you will only be able to attract the av. to invest value.

period-and-closing.title: Period and closing
period-and-closing.text-program: The investment program will be closed after this reporting period. Current investment requests will be cancelled, and new requests won’t be accepted. Profit and funds from the trading account will be distributed between investors and manager according to their shares within the aforementioned program.
period-and-closing.text-period: The current period of the program will end in one hour.

password.title: Password
password.text: Change the password of your trading account.

broker.title: Broker
broker.text-warning: Warning: all signal program subscriptions will be cancelled when switching from GM to Huobi (we do not currently offer copy trading on Huobi).
broker.text-change: A broker change in the program will occur automatically within 24 hours after the end of the reporting period. You will receive a message confirming the successful change of the broker and you will receive a new login and password from the trading account. The invested funds in the program will be transferred to the new broker. All trading history and statistics will be saved on the program page.
broker.text-cancel: Your broker will be changed from {{brokerFrom}} to {{brokerTo}} within 24 hours after the end of the reporting period. You will receive a message confirming the successful change of the broker and you will receive a new login and password from the trading account. The invested funds in the program will be transferred to the new broker. All trading history and statistics will be saved on the program page.
broker.text-cancel-confirm: Do you really want to cancel the change from {{brokerFrom}} to {{brokerTo}}?
broker.text-change-confirm: Do you really want to change from {{brokerFrom}} to {{brokerTo}}?

program-make-signal.success-alert-message: Your program is a signal provider now

0.quote: Rule No. 1: Never lose money. Rule No. 2: Never forget rule No.1
0.author: Warren Buffett

1.quote: Successful investing is about managing risk, not avoiding it.
1.author: Benjamin Graham

2.quote: Money is always eager and ready to work for anyone who is ready to employ it.
2.author: Idowu Koyenikan

3.quote: Investing isn’t about beating others at their game. It’s about controlling yourself at your own game.
3.author: Benjamin Graham

4.quote: The greatest investment we can ever make is to invest our life in the life of someone else.
4.author: Scott Lee

5.quote: In any investment, you expect to have fun and make money.
5.author: Michael Jordan

6.quote: Buy when everyone else is selling and hold until everyone else is buying. That’s not just a catchy slogan. It’s the very essence of successful investing.
6.author: J. Paul Getty

7.quote: When you invest, you are buying a day that you don’t have to work.
7.author: Aya Laraya

8.quote: Freedom is a target; decentralization is a way to reach it, but asset investment is a challenging tool on this way!
8.author: John D. Rockefeller

9.quote: How many millionaires do you know who have become wealthy by investing in savings accounts? I rest my case.
9.author: Robert G. Allen

10.quote: When money realizes that it is in good hands, it wants to stay and multiply in those hands.
10.author: Idowu Koyenikan

11.quote: Money is always eager and ready to work for anyone who is ready to employ it.
11.author: Idowu Koyenikan

12.quote: Money grows on skills not trees.
12.author: Mac Duke

13.quote: You try to be greedy when others are fearful. And you try to be fearful when others are greedy.
13.author: Warren Buffett

14.quote: Nobody ever lost money taking a profit.
14.author: Bernard Baruch

hints.entry-fee-levels: The entry fee is disabled for programs that have not reached level 3. It will be charged only for programs with level 3 or higher.

hints.entry-fee-description: A fee charged upon each investment in the program.
hints.management-fee: Description about management fee is here
hints.management-fee-description: A fee charged for the actual asset management period. Management fee is defined in annual percentage and is charged at the end of each reporting period.
hints.success-fee: Description about success fee is here
hints.success-fee-description: A fee charged upon the total profit made within the reporting period.
hints.subscription-fee: Description about subscription fee is here

hints.signal-success-fee: Description about signal success fee is here

hints.stop-out-level: Description about Stop Out is here
hints.stop-out-level-description: Stop Out is the maximum drawdown level for the reporting period at which the program is stopped, and all investments return to investors.

level-calculator.title: Calculator
level-calculator.genesis-ratio-tooltip: The ratio of the profit of the program against its risk. It is set in the range from 0 to 1. If Genesis Ratio <0.2, then the program is high risk and the InvScale is limited to 1, meaning that the manager can attract no more than his own deposit.
level-calculator.weighted-volume-scale-tooltip:
This is a multiplier of the volume traded by the manager relative to the program balance for all periods. 
It is calculated similarly to the Genesis Ratio, being a weighted average over all given periods.
level-calculator.manager-balance-tooltip: The current value of manager funds in the program.
level-calculator.current-av-to-invest-tooltip: The current amount available for investment into the program. The investment limit and the funds already deposited are not taken into account.
level-calculator.new-av-to-invest-tooltip: The new Av. to invest value you receive as a result of changing parameters within the calculator.
level-calculator.current-investment-scale-tooltip:
The current value ​​of the indicator, which depends on the Age, Volume Scale and Genesis Ratio. The indicator is set in a range from 1 to 20. 
Av. to invest = Investment scale * Manager Balance
level-calculator.new-investment-scale-tooltip:
The new value ​​of the indicator, which depends on the Age, Volume Scale and Genesis Ratio. The indicator is set in a range from 1 to 20. 
Av. to invest = Investment scale * Manager Balance
level-calculator.kyc-disclaimer: All of your investment programs are limited to the first level since you have not yet completed the KYC verification procedure. The maximum amount of investment you can attract at the first level is the equivalent of 1000 USD.

landing-page.description: Join the global market, trade Crypto, Forex, Metals, Stocks, Indices ans Commodities, create and manage own funds, invest and follow best trading strategies.
landing-page.title: Genesis Vision - The Next Generation Social Trading Platform

footer.title: Have a question?
footer.email-title: Write email to Genesis Vision support
footer.subtitle: Get Our mobile app

follows.title: Follow
follows.text: Leverage the expertise of seasoned traders while keeping control of your capital. Just choose a program and Genesis Vision will automatically copy the trades from your account. You will be able to withdraw your investment or exit trades at any point in time.

programs.title: Programs
programs.text: Select investment programs that suit your personal profile and let the manager do the work for you. You will be able to withdraw your investment or profits only at predefined intervals set by the program’s manager.

funds.title: Funds
funds.text: Diversify your capital across hundreds of cryptocurrencies in one click. Select a fund with a composition that matches your opinion on the market and let the manager readjust while the market evolves. You can withdraw your capital at any time you retain full control of your investment.

download.title: Download app
download.text:
The best social trading experience.
 Download the Genesis Vision app today.

slider.slide-1-text: Learn to trade or test your strategies without any financial risks and limitations
slider.slide-2-text: Use your credit or debit card to buy crypto - get started right away as a trader, an investor or a manager on the Genesis Vision platform.
slider.slide-3-text: Use the Genesis Vision two-level Affiliate Network to receive a percentage of the commission paid by your referrals… and your referrals’ referrals!

info.text-invest-5: Choose your perfect investment opportunity, based on risk and profitability levels analysis
info.text-partake-1: Provide trading signals and build an
info.text-partake-2: army of followers around your strategies

brokers.title: Brokers and Exhanges
brokers.description-gm: Genesis Markets is a Forex and Crypto broker that offers trading on the most popular trading terminal in the world — MetaTrader. Genesis Markets allows you to access the best liquidity on traditional markets and multiple crypto exchanges within a single account.
brokers.text-gm-1: Forex, Metals, Commodities, Indices, Shares, Crypto
brokers.description-binance: Binance is one of the largest global cryptocurrency exchanges that provides an ecosystem for trading a wide range of different crypto assets.
brokers.description-rf: RoboForex Ltd is an international IFSC Belize regulated broker which is a member of the RoboForex group. RoboForex provides an access to a wide range of financial instruments and account types.
brokers.text-rf-2: Forex, Stocks, Indices, ETFs, Commodities, Metals, Energies, Crypto
brokers.description-exante: EXANTE is a European investment services company established in 2011 that offers global multi-asset financial services, including direct access to a wide range of financial markets in the US, European Union and Asia-Pacific
brokers.text-exante-2: Forex, Stocks, ETFs, global futures markets, bonds, metals, options, funds, crypto
brokers.description-huobi: Huobi is one of the largest Singapore-based cryptocurrency exchanges,  judging by 24-hour period volume. Founded in China, the company now has offices in Hong Kong, Korea, Japan and the United States.

advantages.title: Our advantages
advantages.text-1: Open multi broker trading platform. Wide range of instruments and asset classes including Forex, Crypto and Stock markets.
advantages.text-2: Wide range of investment opportunities broken by risk tolerance and profitability. Access to risk analysis and management tools. The products offered include Asset Management, Funds and Copytrading.
advantages.title-3: Choose the best tool to make money
advantages.text-3: Choose your role or combine them - Trade, Invest, Manage, Follow or Lead

referral-program.title: Genesis Vision Referral program
referral-program.text-1: Go to “Profile” and get your personal link
referral-program.text-2: Invite your friends to sign in via referral link to get the agent’s commission
referral-program.text-3: Get up to 30% of the agent’s commission
referral-program.text-4: A 2-level partner program is utilized by the Genesis Vision platform. Invite your friends to sign up for the Genesis Vision platform and you will be eligible to receive up to 30% commission from their paid fees for the 1st level referrals and up to 3% for the 2nd level referrals.
referral-program.title-list-1: Rate and general rules for obtaining the agent's commission
referral-program.text-list-1: Commission rate directly depends on the amount of GVT stored in the wallet.
referral-program.text-list-2: If there is less than 1 000 GVT stored in the wallet, the commission will be 15% of the paid fees from the 1st level referrals and 1,5% of the fees from the 2nd level referrals.
referral-program.text-list-3: If there is 1 000 GVT or more stored in the wallet, the commission will be 30% of the paid fees from the 1st level referrals and up to 3% of the fees from the 2nd level referrals.
referral-program.text-list-4: Agent's commissions are accrued once per day at 9:00 AM (UTC).
referral-program.text-list-5: The commissions from all your referrals are summarized each day and the total amount accrued for that day is transferred to the wallets. The wallet currency depends on the currency used by  your referrals to pay for fees.
referral-program.text-list-6: The wallet is checked for a 1 000 GVT balance once per day at a random time.
referral-program.title-list-2: The list of fees used to pay the agent’s commissions
referral-program.text-list-7: Trading Fee commission: generated from each transaction if the referral is trading on Genesis Markets Crypto.
referral-program.text-list-8: Entry Fee commission: the Entry Fee that is charged to investors entering the referrals' programs created with any trading account other than Genesis Markets Crypto.
referral-program.text-list-9: Platform Success fee commission: It is calculated according to the HWM system as a percentage of the profit received from a program during the reporting period or from a trade transaction when copy trading. No profit means no Platform Success fee is charged.

downloads.title: Genesis Vision Downloads
downloads.text-1: One of the most technically advanced and popular in the world of terminals for exchange trading with direct access to the order books and other new features.
downloads.text-2: The application provides advanced mobile trading through your favourite gadget. It supports all of the basic functionality of MetaTrader 5, user alerts for events on transactions, and is easy to connect and install.
downloads.text-3: All the advanced functionality of the MetaTrader 5 platform right in your browser. No need to download and install. Compatible with any operating system (Windows, Mac OS, Linux).

fees.text-1: The list of fees charged by Genesis Vision platform
fees.tab-trading: Trading fees on GM & GM Global
fees.platform-table-head: Type	Fee	Programs	Copy Trading	Funds
fees.list-1:
Entry fee is the fee charged by the platform that is a percentage of the initial amount invested in a Program or a Fund.
Platform Success fee is the fee charged on profits generated by Programs or from a trade transaction when Copy Trading. It is calculated according to the HWM system as a percentage of the profit received from a program during the reporting period or from a trade transaction when copy trading. No profit means no Platform Success fee is charged
For external account, GV charges a 15% volume fee from all copied trades
fees.list-last-item: The percentage depends on the amount of GVT stored in the wallet. For every 1 000 GVT stored in the wallet, investors receive a 10% discount with a maximum discount of 100% (i.e. an investor holding 1 000 GVT will only pay a 9% Success Fee, an investor holding 10 000 GVT will pay no Success Fee).
fees.text-2: The fee charged upon withdrawing funds from the platform. The commission rate depends on the currency used for withdrawing funds
fees.withdrawal-table-head: Wallet	Genesis Vision Token	Ethereum	Bitcoin	Tether
fees.list-2:
Regular: 0,3% trading fee
GVT holders*: 30-55% discount depending on the amount of GVT stored in the wallet.
fees.list-3:
Regular: Trading fee rate depends on the tool used.The list of available tools and the associated fees.
GVT holders: 30-55% discount depending on the amount of GVT stored in the wallet.
fees.text-3: Genesis Vision Token holders who select Genesis Markets as their broker will receive discounted transaction fees.
fees.trading-discount: To be eligible for a trading discount
fees.list-4:
There must be more than 1 GVT stored in the wallet
The "Using GVT to pay for fees" function must be enabled. The fee will be charged at a discount depending on the amount of GVT stored in the wallet.
The discounted fee will be charged from the GVT wallet, not from the trading account.
fees.discounts-table:
From 1 GVT up to 10	30%
Up to 25 GVT	35%
Up to 50 GVT	40%
Up to 100 GVT	45%
Up to 500 GVT	50%
500 GVT+	55%
fees.list-5:
If you switch this function off, the fee will become "Regular" and charge 100%.
If you have enabled the "Using GVT to pay for fees" function but have an insufficient amount of GVT stored in the wallet, this function will no longer work and the fee will become Regular.
For managers the commission for trading will be debited from the manager’s GVT wallet. At the end of the reporting period, the manager will receive a refund of the commission at the expense of increasing the share of own funds in management.
